pr_title: HOTFIX: don't close or wipe out someone else's state

timeline.message: fix up tests, add new ones
fix up tests, add new ones

timeline.bodyText: We actually were already throwing some ProcessorStateExceptions up through  close even when unclean, which I think was the cause of a bug we resolved a few weeks ago. Now we just make no assumptions about whether this will throw or not, and catch any exceptions in StreamTask / StandbyTask if it's a dirty close.
timeline.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText: Nice clean, now we catch the exception in the caller.
